sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A moderate answer vnto Dr. Bastvvicks book; called Independency not Gods ordinance. Wherein is declared the manner how some churches in this city were gathered, and upon what tearmes their members were admitted; that so both the Dr. and the reader may judge, how near some beleevers who walk together in the fellowship of the gospell, do come in their practice to these apostolicall rules which are propounded by the Dr. as Gods method in gethering churches and admitting members. / By Hanserd Knollys. Printed and published according to order. Imprimatur, Ja: Cranford. Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.
20 p.
Printed by Iane Coe., London, : 1645.
A reply to: Bastwick, John. Independency not Gods ordinance (Wing B1063, B1069). Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 17th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A moderate answer vnto Dr. Bastvvicks book; called Independency not Gods ordinance. Wherein is declared the manner how some churches in this city were gathered, and upon what tearmes their members were admitted; that so both the Dr. and the reader may judge, how near some beleevers who walk together in the fellowship of the gospell, do come in their practice to these apostolicall rules which are propounded by the Dr. as Gods method in gethering churches and admitting members. / By Hanserd Knollys. Printed and published according to order. Imprimatur, Ja: Cranford. Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.
20 p.
Printed by Iane Coe., London, : 1645.
A reply to: Bastwick, John. Independency not Gods ordinance (Wing B1063, B1069). Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 17th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
